column2: upon entering the refurbished home turned contemporary restaurant
column3: my guest and I were warmly greeted. The host let us know our wait time and after much consideration
column4: we waited outside for approximately 30 minutes. The other host continuously came by to fill our glasses with Uchi's own filtered water. Turns out
column5: the filtered water dramatically increases the taste and texture of the rice so I can get down with that. As we were waiting
column6: we decided to scope through the menu so that we will be able to place our order upon being seated. Some may know
column8: it takes time to sort through the types of foods you desire to eat.
